ygData.subject: Re: Do I ever have a chance at making high level?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well umm... errr... ... no it gets longer generally, and youve probably been soloing, if you are on at limited times, your ability to solo will diminish at
ygData.messageBody:
Well umm... errr... ... no
it gets longer generally, and youve probably been soloing, if you are on at
limited times, your ability to solo will diminish at around 18 and not
return till the late 20's. You must group to get the exp, and this can be
difficult for you because the friends you make will most likely outpace you.
But keep the faith, you can do it.

Jaezebel Moonsong-Yeuxune
Gypsy Bard of the 33rd song
<Spirit of the Moon>
Innoruuk
-----Original Message-----
From: Jason Sanderson <moxy1@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, December 27, 1999 8:28 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Do I ever have a chance at making high level?


>From: Jason Sanderson <moxy1@...>
>
>I play a HE 13 level bard, but I am only a part-time player (maybe a couple
>hours a week). Lvl 12 took forever and 13 seems to be taking longer...
>Will leveling get easier as I get more levels or does it take longer for
>each new level? I know that the XP gap gets bigger each level, but
>hopefully the better equipment that comes later and a better selection of
>mobs make it easier? To make things short, is the easier or harder to level
>in the early teens compared to later levels..
>Also, is it impossible to reach high levels without camping? I hate
>camping and will not camp for more than 1/2 an hour before I get bored and
>leave....
>
>Cheers,
>Reed
>13 lvl Bard of S Ro..
>
>
>Always carry a flagon of whiskey in case of snakebite and furthermore
>always carry a small snake. - W. C. Fields
